title: Cambridge Interact ‘Let’s talk about Porn!’
description:
Cambridge Interact a social/support group for gay and bisexual men

Sexual Health Week is almost upon us and this year the theme is porn and this seemed like a brilliant subject to talk about in Interact!!

We all have opinions on it! Is it right? Is it wrong?
Are the people who act/star in porn being exploited?
Is that what sex is really like?
Are the story lines actually any good?

Then of course, there are also the legal questions about it!

Come along and meet new people, talk about your experiences, find out about what ‘community’ events there are out there, and get support to overcome any barriers you might experience in accessing the kind of social/support networks you want to be part of. The get togethers are informal and friendly and you can come for a short while or stay for the whole session.

What is provided?
Light refreshments provided
Free condoms and sexual health information available!

How do I find out more?

For more information contact Graham by email on graham.lewis@dhiverse.org.uk or by phone on 07746 931709 or 01223 508805 (Dhiverse office), or even just turn up on the night. You can also find more information on our website www.dhiverse.org.uk
